instructions: Open Settings from the home screen. Tap Connections . Toggle Wi-Fi Calling to On . How to enable Wi-Fi Calling on the Galaxy S20 Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central

Open the dialer from the home screen. Tap the overflow menu (three vertical dots on the right). Choose Settings . Toggle Wi-Fi Calling to On . How to enable Wi-Fi Calling on the Galaxy S20 Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central

Go to Settings > Connections > More connection settings and tap Wireless Emergency Alerts . Tap the Settings menu (three dots) for Wireless Emergency Alerts . From the options that appear, select Settings . Select Alert types . Select the alerts you want to disable.
